create.name: productListConfirmation
create.body:
[[tags.productListConfirmation_productListTitle]] [[numProducts]] [[#eq numProducts 1]] [[tags.productListConfirmation_singleItemText]] [[/eq]] [[#neq numProducts 1]] [[tags.productListConfirmation_multipleItemText]] [[/neq]] [[#and isSplitted showSubordersInfo]] [[tags.productListConfirmation_shipmentsNumberText]] [[/and]] [[#each suborders]] [[#and isSplitted showSubordersInfo]] [[tags.productListConfirmation_shipmentText]] [[this.suborderId]] [[/and]] [[#if this.cancelDate]] - [[tags.productListConfirmation_cancelDateText]] [[/if]] [[#each this.items]] [[#if this.imageUrl]] [[/if]] [[this.size]] [[#if this.sizeDescription]] [[this.sizeDescription]] [[/if]] [[this.description]] [[this.color]] [[substring this.sku 0 1]]/[[substring this.sku 1 5]]/[[substring this.sku 5 8]]/[[substring this.sku 8 11]]/[[substring this.sku 11 13]] [[#if this.isPantone]] [[tags.productListConfirmation_customizationsWarn]] [[/if]] [[#if this.isCustom]] [[tags.productListConfirmation_customizationsButton]] [[tags.productListConfirmation_customizationsWarn]] [[#each this.itemCustomizations]]
[[tags.productListConfirmation_customizationsText]]: [[this.embroideryText]]
[[tags.productListConfirmation_customizationsArea]]: [[this.embroideryArea]]
[[tags.productListConfirmation_customizationsTypography]]: [[this.embroideryFont]]
[[tags.productListConfirmation_customizationsColor]]: [[this.embroideryColor]]
[[#if this.serviceCost]]
[[tags.productListConfirmation_customizationsPrice]]: [[this.serviceCost]]
[[/if]] [[/each]] [[/if]] [[this.units]] [[#eq this.units 1]] [[tags.productListConfirmation_singleUnitText]] [[/eq]] [[#neq this.units 1]] [[tags.productListConfirmation_multipleUnitsText]] [[/neq]] [[this.price]] [[/each]] #################################### ## Tarjeta regalo #################################### [[#each this.giftCards]] [[#if this.imageUrl]] [[/if]] [[this.description]]
[[tags.productListConfirmation_fromText]]: [[this.from]]
[[tags.productListConfirmation_receiverPhoneText]]: [[this.receiverPhone]]
 1 [[tags.productListConfirmation_singleUnitText]] [[this.price]] [[/each]] #################################### ## Tarjeta regalo virtual #################################### [[#each this.virtualGiftCards]] [[#if this.imageUrl]] [[/if]] [[this.description]]
[[tags.productListConfirmation_fromText]]: [[this.from]]
[[tags.productListConfirmation_receiverEmailText]]: [[this.receiverEmail]]
[[tags.productListConfirmation_devileryDateText]] [[this.deliveryDate]]
 1 [[tags.productListConfirmation_singleUnitText]] [[this.price]] [[/each]] [[/each]]
